characterInfo.Appears in: The Way of Kings, Words of Radiance, Oathbringer (mentioned),  Rhythm of War (mentioned)

characterDescription:
Hav is a sergeant in Amaram's army. Amaram sends the new recruits to him, including Kaladin and Tien. He seems to have been in charge of the new recruits in the army.
Hav harassed the "lad" (i.e., Shallan in disguise) as s/he began to infiltrate the perimeter of Amaram's manor. He insists that from then on that s/he report at the guard posts when s/he visits and then waves her/him on through.
Soon thereafter, disguised as Telesh, Shallan tells Amaram that Hav had stopped a messenger on the perimeter of the manor who had been coming for Amaram. Still in disguise, Shallan tells Amaram that Hav had sent her back to tell him so.
Hav taught Kaladin how to punch:
